item.description:
It is Fat Tuesday 2011!

All Red Sox Natives with a Friend of Harpoon card are invited to Harpoon's pre Mardi Gras Night Party at Dick's Last Resort from 4:30 - 6:30 pm.

Bring your FOH card to gain free entry and complimentary appetizers and a pint glass filled with something to drink. Guess what it is?

Additional pints will only be $3.50.
item.how_to_find_us: At the Bar or in the reserved Harpoon section
item.why: Friends of Harpoon already know why you should do this. You need to be a Friend to take advantage of the offer. Go to Harpoons web site and become a Friend and you will know.
item.name: Friend of Harpoon Mardi Gras Madness Offer on Fat Tuesday at Dick's Last Resort
